document.discussion_title: West End Watch Co. SECUNDUS SIDE SECOND VINTAGE MANUAL WINDING for sale $173
document.topic_text: Case Material : All Chrome Case Condition : Used and Excellent as per its Age Sign : Signed on the Dial Hands : Blue Hands Visit our website to access full range of watches wristmenwatches.com * Payment is accepted by PAYPAL (which assure you everything about watch is as described and its not fake or replica watch) * Shipment is done by DHL (Within 5 Bussiness Days you will receive the watch, Package Updates and Tracking Number are updated on email and Phone number) * All my watches are original and running in perfect condition all are tested before advertisement You may also be interested in these watches
